actor_awards.notes: Best known for playing The Lone Ranger in the long-running television series and two feature films. He was inducted into the Hollywood Walk of Fame in 1987 and received the Golden Boot Award in 1983 for his contribution to the Western genre.

filmography.title: The Lone Ranger
filmography.role_description: The masked former Texas Ranger who fights for justice in the Old West alongside his faithful companion Tonto.
filmography.plot: The Lone Ranger and Tonto investigate the stirring of hostilities between local ranchers and a tribe of Indians, discovering a wealthy rancher is behind the conflict to hide a silver discovery.

filmography.title: The Lone Ranger and the Lost City of Gold
filmography.role_description: The legendary masked hero who protects a secret city of gold from greed-driven outlaws.
filmography.plot: The Lone Ranger and Tonto must stop a band of hooded riders from murdering the Indians who hold the medallions necessary to find a secret city of gold.

filmography.title: The Lone Ranger
filmography.role_description: The sole survivor of a Texas Ranger ambush who dons a mask to fight outlawry in the American West. (TV Series)
filmography.plot: A Texas Ranger left for dead is nursed back to health by a Native American and assumes a new identity to battle evil.
filmography.awards: Primetime Emmy: Nomination - Best Children's Show

filmography.title: Ghost of Zorro
filmography.role_description: The grandson of the original Zorro who takes up the mantle to protect the construction of a pioneer telegraph line.
filmography.plot: A surveyor for the telegraph company assumes the guise of his legendary ancestor Zorro to fight a gang trying to stop the telegraph's expansion.

filmography.title: The Crimson Ghost
filmography.role_description: A gangster and henchman who becomes involved in a plot to steal a counter-atomic device.
filmography.plot: A masked villain known as the Crimson Ghost tries to steal a device that can short out all electrical power, while a criminologist tries to stop him.

filmography.title: Perils of Nyoka
filmography.role_description: A heroic doctor who leads an expedition to find the Golden Tablets of Hippocrates.
filmography.plot: An expedition in North Africa searches for a lost papyrus that holds the secret to ancient medical knowledge, battling a queen and her gorilla along the way.

filmography.title: Jesse James Rides Again
filmography.role_description: The famous outlaw who attempts to clear his name and help farmers being terrorized by night raiders.
filmography.plot: Jesse James tries to make restitution for his past crimes but is framed for a bank robbery and must find the real culprits.

filmography.title: Adventures of Frank and Jesse James
filmography.role_description: Moore reprises his role as the legendary outlaw who teams up with his brother to fight a corrupt mine owner.
filmography.plot: Frank and Jesse James try to help a girl whose father was killed by a man wanting to steal their gold mine.

filmography.title: Radar Men from the Moon
filmography.role_description: A henchman working for Retik, the ruler of the Moon, who is plotting to conquer Earth.
filmography.plot: Commando Cody flies to the moon to investigate a series of atomic explosions on Earth and discovers an alien invasion plot.

filmography.title: Black Dragons
filmography.role_description: An FBI agent who uncovers a Japanese plot to sabotage the American war effort through plastic surgery.
filmography.plot: A Nazi surgeon transforms Japanese spies into likenesses of American industrialists to sabotage the war effort.

filmography.title: Kansas Pacific
filmography.role_description: A villainous henchman working to sabotage the building of the Kansas Pacific railroad.
filmography.plot: Union officers work to complete a vital railroad line across Kansas just before the outbreak of the Civil War, facing sabotage from Southern sympathizers.

filmography.title: G-Men Never Forget
filmography.role_description: A federal agent dedicated to stopping a crime boss who has undergone plastic surgery to impersonate a police commissioner.
filmography.plot: G-Man Ted O'Hara battles a criminal mastermind who has kidnapped the police commissioner and taken his place.

filmography.title: Son of Geronimo: Apache Avenger
filmography.role_description: A wagon train scout who tries to establish peace with the Apache Indians.
filmography.plot: A frontiersman tries to bring peace between settlers and the Apaches, who are being incited to war by outlaws.

filmography.title: Jungle Drums of Africa
filmography.role_description: An American engineer in Africa who fights against subversive agents trying to gain control of uranium deposits.
filmography.plot: An engineer and a missionary's daughter battle agents of a foreign power in the African jungle.

filmography.title: Buffalo Bill in Tomahawk Territory
filmography.role_description: The famous frontiersman who tries to prevent an Indian uprising incited by white renegades.
filmography.plot: Buffalo Bill Cody is sent by the government to stop a Sioux uprising, only to find that white men posing as Indians are causing the trouble.

filmography.title: The Cowboy and the Indians
filmography.role_description: A henchman in this Gene Autry western about the mistreatment of Native Americans.
filmography.plot: Gene Autry investigates the cheating of reservation Indians by a corrupt trading post owner.

filmography.title: Kit Carson
filmography.role_description: A supporting role in this biographical western about the famous frontiersman.
filmography.plot: Frontiersman Kit Carson guides a wagon train through dangerous Indian territory to California.

filmography.title: The Son of Monte Cristo
filmography.role_description: A loyal lieutenant who aids the hero in his fight against a dictator.
filmography.plot: The son of the Count of Monte Cristo fights to liberate a Grand Duchess and her country from a tyrant.

filmography.title: International Lady
filmography.role_description: A supporting character in this wartime espionage thriller.
filmography.plot: An FBI agent and a Scotland Yard detective team up to catch a beautiful spy during World War II.

filmography.title: Sheriff of Wichita
filmography.role_description: A crooked lieutenant involved in a plot to steal gold shipments.
filmography.plot: Rocky Lane goes undercover to find the mastermind behind a series of gold robberies.

filmography.title: Night Stage to Galveston
filmography.role_description: A corrupt Texas State Police officer who abuses his power.
filmography.plot: Gene Autry and Pat Buttram fight corruption within the State Police in post-Civil War Texas.

filmography.title: Masked Raiders
filmography.role_description: A villainous role in this Tim Holt western about a masked gang.
filmography.plot: Two Texas Rangers investigate a series of bank robberies committed by a gang of masked riders.

filmography.title: The Hawk of Wild River
filmography.role_description: The notorious outlaw leader known as 'The Hawk' who is hunted by the Durango Kid.
filmography.plot: The Durango Kid is sent to capture a notorious outlaw who has been terrorizing the territory.

filmography.title: Bandits of El Dorado
filmography.role_description: A criminal posing as a lawman in this Durango Kid western.
filmography.plot: The Durango Kid goes undercover to infiltrate a gang of counterfeiters led by a man posing as a marshal.

filmography.title: Heldorado
filmography.role_description: A reporter who gets involved in Roy Rogers' investigation of a black market syndicate.
filmography.plot: Roy Rogers helps clean up a gambling syndicate during the Helldorado festival in Las Vegas.

filmography.title: The Far Frontier
filmography.role_description: A smuggler of criminals across the border in this Roy Rogers western.
filmography.plot: Roy Rogers investigates a gang that smuggles American criminals into Mexico and foreign criminals into the US.
